level.heading: Prosecution by Attorney General.
level.text: Prosecutions under this subchapter shall be brought in the Superior Court of the District of Columbia in name of the District by the Corporation Counsel.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-115
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-115, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 16-1021.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 7-231
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 7-231, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 16-1021.
